name: haptic
description: Haptic is a self-hosted music server for managing your audio library with a clean UI, playlists, and metadata views. It supports browser streaming and offline mode via PWA integration.
features: Library Management: Organize music collection, Metadata editing, Album artwork. Beautiful libraries.
Streaming: Browser playback, High-quality audio, Gapless playback. Seamless listening.
PWA: Offline mode, Install as app, Background playback. Native-like experience.
Playlists: Create collections, Smart playlists, Queue management. Curate your music.
Search: Fast indexing, Filter by artist/album, Quick access. Find anything instantly.
Mobile-Friendly: Responsive design, Touch controls, Swipe gestures. Perfect for phones.
Format Support: MP3, FLAC, AAC, OGG, Multiple codecs. Play everything.
Self-Hosted: Your music, your server, Complete control. True ownership.
